title: Horsepower Looking for Temporary/sub Mid or Top
body:
Our midlaner will be out of town for a week and we are looking for a temp replacement which can also double up as a sub for any games. 

Requirements:
-Plat 2+
-Decent mic + Teamspeak
-friendly, easy to communicate with and not argumentative
-Fill in for any games for the coming months (Ya'll know how hard it is to get 5 people online sometiems)

Leave any questions or your response below

Cheers
Navi
